verses.verse: <S%H3117>Day<s%> after <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5042>pour<s%> forth <S%H562>speech,<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> after <S%H3915>night<s%> they <S%H2331>display<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
There is no <S%H562>speech<s%> nor <S%H1697>language,<s%> where their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is not <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

Their <S%H6957>voice<s%> has gone <S%H3318>out<s%> through all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> their <S%H4405>words<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8398>world.<s%> In them he has <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> for the <S%H8121>sun,<s%>
which is as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> coming <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H2646>room,<s%> like a strong <S%H1368>man<s%> <S%H7797>rejoicing<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> his <S%H734>course.<s%>

His going <S%H4161>forth<s%> is from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> his <S%H8622>circuit<s%> to its <S%H7098>ends;<s%> There is nothing <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from its <S%H2535>heat.<s%>

More to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> are they than <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H7227>yes,<s%> than much fine <S%H6337>gold;<s%> <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> also than <S%H1706>honey<s%> and the extract of the <S%H5317>honeycomb.<s%>
Moreover by them is your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H2094>warned.<s%> In <S%H8104>keeping<s%> them there is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6118>reward.<s%>
Who can <S%H995>discern<s%> his <S%H7691>errors?<s%> <S%H5352>Forgive<s%> me from hidden <S%H5641>errors.<s%>

Keep <S%H2820>back<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> also from <S%H2086>presumptuous<s%> <S%H4910>sins.<s%> Let them not have dominion over <S%H8552>me.<s%> Then I will be upright. I will be blameless and <S%H5352>innocent<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>

Let the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and the <S%H1902>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and my <S%H1350>redeemer.<s%>
